overview.en: Greencore, built under the Blockchain framework of Greencore Protocol, is specialized and dedicating in Reconstructing New-energy industry by introducing Greencore Trading & Settlement Platform integrating areas of Carbon Trading, New-energy Assets Trading, Renewable Energy Certificates, and CCS (Carbon Capture and Storage) to accomplish an Eco-system with higher efficiency, transparency and liquidity for the New-energy industry.
overview.zh: Greencore，构建于Greencore Protocol协议层之上，致力于利用区块链技术重构新能源产业。Greencore新能源交易及清结算系统涉及碳排放、新能源资产交易、可再生能源验证、碳捕捉和储存等在内的多个应用场景，以期实现更高效、更透明、流动性更强的新能源生态系统。
